clinical_study.brief_title: Preoperative Subclinical DVT Screening in Locally Advanced Bladder Cancer Patients Candidate for Radical Cystectomy.
clinical_study.official_title: Preoperative Detection of Subclinical Lower Limb Deep Venous Thrombosis in Locally Advanced Bladder Cancer Patients Candidate for Radical Cystectomy

brief_summary.textblock: Preoperative subclinical DVT screening in locally advanced bladder cancer patients candidate for radical cystectomy.

detailed_description.textblock: 60 patient with local advanced bladder cancer are subjected to preoperative lower limb duplex within 1 week preoperative to radical cystectomy

primary_outcome.description: Asymptomatic patients candidate for radical cystectomy

clinical_study.condition: Bladder Cancer Patients Candidate for Radical Cystectomy

arm_group.arm_group_label: 60 patients with local advanced bladder cancer
arm_group.description: Local advanced bladder cancer patients candidate for radical cystectomy

intervention.description: Lower limb duplex and doppler one week before radical cystectomy
intervention.arm_group_label: 60 patients with local advanced bladder cancer

study_pop.textblock: Locally advanced Bladder cancer patients candidate for radical cystectomy and with no symptoms of DVT

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- any age
- Any sex
- Muscle invasive bladder cancer local advanced patients candidate for radical cystectomy
Exclusion Criteria:
- Unfit patients
- any contraindication for surgery
- obese
- coagulopathy
- bedridden
